item.title: Sorting my socks with deep learning — Part 1
item.description: Sorting my socks with deep learning — Part 1 Can I arrange my sock drawer using machine learning? An adventure in pairing my socks using transfer learning to build a custom sock image classification model. A small project to train and deploy an object recognition model on AWS DeepLens hardware for identifying my socks. Sock classification madness to neatly paired The Idea I have a crazy idea that I can pair my mismatched socks with machine learning.
